text: Since the show ended back in 2007, the former co - stars have both become parents with Reeser giving birth to sons Finneus, 5, and Dashiell, 3, while McKenziewelcomed his first child, daughter Frances, with fianc√© Morena Baccarin last March. Reeser spoke out about her character's relationship with Ryan ( McKenzie ) and the prospect of a reunion in an interview with People's Choice in 2015. ` ` It was a slow progression between the characters,'' she said. ` ` And I adore Ben, I loved working with him. We had a good working relationship, so it was a pleasure to get more screen time with him because I like him as a person.'' She added : ` ` I will always love Taylor and I would be so curious
